title: HTTP Request Validator
description: Implement a function that validates HTTP request objects against a schema. The validator should check required fields, validate types, and return detailed error messages for invalid requests.
requirements: Takes two parameters: request object and validation schema
Check for required fields in request body
Validate field types (string, number, boolean, array)
Collect all validation errors (don't stop at first error)
Handle nested objects in validation schema
Return empty errors array when validation passes

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function that validates email addresses using a regex pattern.
Implement a function that checks if an object has all required properties.
Implement a function that validates data types at runtime.
